text:
Apa yang terlihat keren darinya saat itu? Jelas tidak ada, lantas apa yang membuat mereka seperti itu? Tentu saja terpana dengan pesona Jimin yang waktu itu memakai kemeja putih yang bagian lengannya digulung hingga siku, dan menampakkan lengannya yang terdapat tattoo bertuliskan 'hello'.
"Apa kabarmu, Jung?" Jimin menghela napas lalu menatap nanar makam adiknya. "Aku harap kau bahagia di sana. Apa kau tahu, aku sudah membantu banyak orang hari ini. Dan ada seorang gadis yang kehilangan saudaranya karena alasan yang sama seperti alasanmu meninggal waktu itu." Ia menarik napas dalam, dadanya mulai terasa sesak.
"Biasanya kalau aku bercerita soal hariku seperti ini kau akan protes. Kau akan bilang kalau aku laki-laki yang payah dan berlebihan. Kau akan bilang aku seperti perempuan yang gampang curhat. Kenapa sekarang kau hanya tersenyum begitu?" ucap Jimin lagi dengan tatapan yang terkunci pada foto yang terpajang di sana.
trans:
What looked so cool of him at that moment? Apparently, none, then, what made them act like that? Of course, they were attracted by Jimin's charm who wore white shirt with the sleeves rolled up to the elbow, revealing his arm with a tattoo saying 'hello'.
"How are you, Jung?" Jimin took a deep breath and then gazed sharply at his brother's grave. "I hope you are happy there. Do you know, I have helped many people today. And there was a girl who lost her brother with the same reason like yours when you died that day." He took a deep breath, his chest started to get stuffy.
"You used to protest if I told you the problems in my days. You would say I was a lousy and overrated guy. You would say that I was like a girl who shared easily. Why do you only smile like that now?" said Jimin again with his gaze locked on the photo displayed there.
